Reviewing clothing beyond quality is just preference so I'll review polyester vs cotton. I prefer polyester because it doesn't fade like cotton. A hundred washes later and it'll look the same as it was on day one. It also dries more efficiently. Since cotton absorbs more water, it stands to reason that it requires more drying, therefore more heat for longer. The downside to polyester is that is also retains odor more efficiently than cotton. Something to do with oil from the skin staying on the surface and oxidizing vs. being absorbed with the moisture within the cotton fibers. If I remember correctly. Otherwise, nice shirt.

The “recommended” Amazon size for me is listed at XL however, I looked at the size guide and ordered the Medium (smallest size available). The shirt is easily an XL even though the tag has a letter M stamped on it. The quality seems fine. I bought it for the course and to play gigs in when we do 80s stuff. It will work for that but boy oh boy is it big.
Vary nice
He loved it.. true to size, perfect golf shirt material

I am a Larger size medium guy. If I put a medium in the dryer, they no longer fit me. I ordered this in a medium because of the material and this thing is easily an extra large to 2X size with a medium Tag in to the shirt. There is no way on any planet that this shirt is a medium. It is not even close to the size guide they offer with the measurements. I could put four of my bodies in this shirt side-by-side and still have plenty of room in this size “medium “
I'm a bigger dude and this shirt was just too short for me. Don't need my gut hanging out if I raise my arms up. Great material and design though. Bummed it didn't work out.
The design and sizing were great, but my husband wore it out golfing and said he was sweating like crazy because the fabric doesn't let any air in. Probably won't get worn again.

The shirt feels great, Fits great, Looks great. Slightly stretchy fits loser than some golf shirts. If you like them tight, Don't get a size larger like usual in a golf shirt.

Summary : I do not recommend.  White thread was used for the majority of the seams on this black shirt. The white stitches show from the front side. The seams are not straight and the collar area that would typically fold open is one of the areas where the white thread shows. If you zoom in on my photos, it will show what I am describing. There is also a black rectangle about 1”x3/4” that is a different color of black in a random spot on the back of the shirt.  We ordered a XXL and it does fit true to size.  The price at the time I chose it was $14.88 and at the time of this review has gone down to just under $10.  I cannot recommend this shirt.

To start with the appearance of this shirt is absolutely beautiful. The picture is crystal clear and you can tell what it is from a long distance away. The thickness is decent it's not quite as lightweight as I thought it would be for being a moisture wicking type of shirt but it is what it is. It's comfortable to wear however it is not long enough. If there were another two to three inches longer it would be absolutely perfect. Other than the length the fits fine. Good quality materials and that's a good value regardless of the fact I just wish it was a little bit longer.

This shirt is funny and definitely a conversation starter! From a distance it looks like mermaid scales and up close there is a variety of butt shapes and sizes! The fabric is lightweight and feels like it's moisture wicking as well. It's soft, launders easily, does not need a lot of ironing and doesn't wrinkle easily. However, the sizing is off. I measured my fiance before getting this for him and I know his chest size to the inch - when this item came I measured the shoulder width against a M sized t-shirt he was wearing and it was a match. The item I ordered was a large because I sized up for allowance. But when I measured the body of the item, it looked like an XL-L size! The width of a Large is too large; the body of the shirt is like a tent. I should have bought him a S or a M but based on the size chart, the M chest at 49inches would be too snug and notes show to allow half inch for tolerance so we sized up. Additionally, the item is described as Dry Fit - but a DriFit Polo shirt is typically smaller in size across the body so usually you size up for more room. Stick to your size or size down if you are getting this item.

Overall I'm not terribly impressed with this shirt.  I like the design, and it looks OK from a distance, but that's about all of the positive things that I have to say about it.  The material is thin, and very cheap looking.  It's like the entire shirt is a "print"... the inside of the black shirt is white, giving it a very cheap look and feel.  The stitching isn't great, and the one I received has several areas where the stitching appears to be loose and pulling apart... I expect after a couple of wears and washes, that it'll begin to fall apart.  I'd probably give less stars, but it's pretty cheap and you get what you pay for... so I think a middle-of-the-road rating is appropriate.  If you're looking for a cheap shirt for a one-time event, then this might be a decent option... but if you're looking for something of decent quality, I'd pass on this one.I wouldn't buy it again.

It stinks because I love this print, but the bagginess of the size makes it all unpleasant. If you're ordering this, consider going down a size. Also know it's 100% polyester and doesn't breathe the best or stretch very well.
This shirt is so funny and would make a great gift.  It fits well and is very comfortable.

This is perfect for a 90’s night or some kind of throwback event. The material is slightly shiny and similar to most costume fabric as opposed to shirt fabric. Overall impressed with the appearance and I can’t wait to see it out.

I got the butt shirt. It's a great shirt. The first time I wore it people complimented the shirt, then I told them to look closely at the pattern. Then they gasp and start laughing. From a distance it's good looking, up close it's funny.

Got this shirt for my husband who always loves fun print shirts for summer. I got him this one in the American Flag for summer 4th celebrations as I’m a little tired of the regular red white and blue one he wears every year. He looks great in this one other than the collar is a little floppy compared to a stiffer cotton collar. He says it’s very comfortable and seems like it should be a great shirt for hot summer days (other than being a dark color). Overall he is very happy with it and said he would recommend it to others.
Nice material, good fit, but the color of the pattern is more faded than expected.  Overall a nice casual shirt though, thanks!

评论概述: Fun patterns.  Good fit.  Comfortable material.
评论详情: I got the pineapple pattern.  xL fit like most.  The fabric is lightweight man made materials.  It’s wicking and comfortable.  Buttons are acceptable. The collar is very light.  It may not stay in shape for long.  Nice shirt though.

It says in the description that it's a golf shirt, but I'm going to treat it more like a pool shirt. It's silky soft, breathable, and light weight. This would be great for one of those scorching hot summer days! Good quality of the stitching and the material itself. Nice shirt!

I immediately thought of Saved By The Bell whenever I saw this polo shirt. I had to get it. It wicks away moisture very well. It has plenty of give in it which allows for ease of movement. It is very comfortable to wear as it is surprisingly soft to the touch. It appears to be very well put together, as the stitching seems very secure and the shirt is, overall, very durable. It also features two collar buttons. The coloring is very bright and definitely brings back memories of the early 90s. I definitely recommend it.

I ordered the pineapple shirt to wear when I play my ukulele in a group setting  The shirt is sized correctly to the size chart. It washed fine in cold water and I hung it up to dry. The print is bright and will surely grab some attention. The collar, like many shirt made from polyester flops some, but the neck is big enough to button to the top button. The material is thin, but adequate. I'm not sure if the polyester will be hot in the Arizona summer weather, but so far it's comfy indoors in the spring.

This is a collared shirt with two buttons and a very small collar. It has a thin polyester-like material and a very bright, colorful design. It is a '90s style retro pattern with neon colors and recognizable shapes. The pattern repeats about the entire shirt including the collar, and then there is an additional lining inside so the print does not visible inside the shirt.  It fits well size wise but the proportions make it a little uncomfortable. The tiny collar is difficult to keep in place and flaps around as you move with the shirt. But it is worth it for the design itself. This is the perfect shirt for a '90s party or other retro type event, it is lightweight and can be worn outdoors in any setting.

评论概述: Fund design but not my favorite cut
评论详情: I have maybe almost a dozen goofy sorts of shirts mostly Hawaiian style button ups made with this type of material but this is the first that is a polo and I'm torn on the style of shirt itself.If I'm going to be out in the hot sun sweating it up on a golf course I'll likely wear a legit Nike, Under Armour or other nice technical polo.  This material is thin and can be breathable but in my experience it can also trap some body heat more or feel a little warm on the skin when you're out in the sun on a hot and humid day.That's all fine I think it's par for the course and my Hawaiian shirts are like that too.  What makes it look a little weird to me is I feel like this pattern/design may look better on a full button down Hawaiian shirt and not a polo.  My wife's direct words to me when noticing it were that looks weird but makes the shirt look that much better.  So if you're going for a funky goofy vibe then maybe this is fine.  But I also feel like the cut/sizing is a bit more baggy/boxy than most other large shirts and may have played better if it was a full button down.  If I had gotten a medium I think it would have helped some but likely been a bit short in the torso for when I am active such as swinging clubs or if I were to ride my bike while wearing this.  At $26 you get a fun and mostly functional shirt.  If you're between sizes like me or have a bit more of a lean torso then it may look to fit a bit odd though I might be overly critical on this one.

评论概述: This is a fun golf shirt to wear
评论详情: The fabric is soft and wicks away moisture. This is a very bright print and fun to wear. The fit is very comfortable and easy to wear.

This shirt was too funny to not get! Definitely no confusion on what the pattern is. The material is 100% polyester and the print is vibrant. The fit is a bit large - I could have gone down a size - but the material is comfortable and lightweight. The listing says not to dry it in the dryer, but I dried it on low heat and there don't appear to be any adverse impacts.
Although the shirt had a good fit and nice design the breathability of the product is not there.
Tons of feedback on this one.
Bought for my husband but fits my 15 year old. At least he likes it. I told him not to tell anyone his mom gave it to him.
